$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/history.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/history
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/history.text:
Full change log  https://kookma.github.io/TW-Todolist/#ChangeLog

* ''1.2.2'' -- 2021.04.22 -- updated to Tiddlywiki 5.1.23
* ''1.2.1'' -- 2020.04.05 -- minor issue in drag and drop fixed
* ''1.2.0'' -- 2020.04.03 -- new features, item reording using drag and drop
* ''1.1.0'' -- 2020.03.31 -- bugs fixed, moved to new Thirdflow development platform
* ''1.0.0'' -- 2019.07.22 -- first stable release

\define todolist-list-archived-items(base:"") <$vars archiveTiddler="""$(td-basePath)$/archive/$base$""" priorityTiddler="""$(td-basePath)$/priority/$base$""" > <$list filter="[indexes[]!sort[]]" variable="item">
<>
<>
<$view tiddler=<> field="title" format="date" template="mmm 0DD, YYYY 0hh:0mm"/> <$transclude tiddler=<> index=<>/>
\end \define todolist-show-priority-level() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Prority of archived items cannot be changed"> <$macrocall $name="disp-priority-badge" color={{{[getindex]}}} /> \end \define todolist-delete-item() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/times.svg}} <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> \end \define todolist-empty-archived-tiddler(base) <$vars archiveTiddler="""$(td-basePath)$/archive/$base$""" priorityTiddler="""$(td-basePath)$/priority/$base$""" > <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" tooltip="Empty archive"> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} Delete archive <$list filter="[indexes[]!sort[]]" variable="item"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/bulk-o.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/bulk-operation
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/bulk-o.text: \define todolist-all-tasks-unfinished() <$list filter="[indexes[]limit[1]]" emptyMessage="You're all done" variable=ignore> <$count filter="[indexes[]]"/> ITEMS \end \define todolist-mark-all-button() <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="markall" text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Mark all items as done" setTitle=<> setIndex="markall" setTo="yes"> {{$:/core/images/save-button}} <> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="markall" text="yes"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Mark all items as undone" setTitle=<> setIndex="markall" setTo="no"> {{$:/core/images/refresh-button}} <> \end \define tdl-done-all() <$list filter="[indexes[]]" variable="item"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value={{{ [getindex] }}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value="done" /> <$macrocall $name="todolist-remove-item-from-list" targetTiddler=<> item=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> \end \define tdl-undone-all() <$list filter="[indexes[]]" variable="item"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value={{{ [getindex] }}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value="undone" /> <$macrocall $name="todolist-add-item-to-list" targetTiddler=<> item=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> \end \define todolist-archive-completed-items() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Archive done items"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/archive.svg}} <$list filter="[indexes[]]" variable="item"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value={{{ [getindex] }}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="markall" $value="no"/> \end \define todolist-display-archived-items() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Display archived items"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/list-alt.svg}} <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/template/archive-list" title=<> /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="td-namespace" $value=<> /> <$action-navigate $to=<> $scroll="yes"/> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/catego.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/category
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/catego.text: \define high(text) $text$ \end \define normal(text) $text$ \end \define low(text) $text$ \end \define fixme(text) {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/wrench.svg}} $text$ \end \define bug(text) {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/bug.svg}} $text$ \end \define horn(text) {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/bullhorn}} $text$ \end \define tip(text) {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/lightbulb}} $text$ \end \define share(text) {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/share-alt}} $text$ \end

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/confir.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/confirm-delete
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/confir.text:
\define todolist-confirm-delete( btnLabel:"Delete these tiddlers", confirmMessage:"Are you sure you wish to delete", stateTiddler:"", countFilter:"", actionMacro:"") <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" tooltip="Empty archive" popup=<> > {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} $btnLabel$ <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="belowleft" animate="yes">
<$set name="resultCount" value="""<$count filter=<<__countFilter__>> />"""> $confirmMessage$ <> tiddler(s)?
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" tooltip="Empty archive" actions=<<__actionMacro__>> > {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} Delete all?
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/dragga.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/draggable-list
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/dragga.text:
\define draggable-list(targetTiddler) \whitespace trim <$vars targetTiddler=<<__targetTiddler__>> > <$list filter="[list]" variable="item"> <$droppable actions=<>>
<$draggable tiddler=<> > <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/template/undone-task" field="text"/> <> \end \define droppable-actions() <$list filter="[contains]" variable=ignore> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="list" $subfilter="+[insertbefore:item]"/> \end \define xxdisp-empty-placeholder() <$tiddler tiddler=""> <$droppable actions=<> tag="div">
 
\end \define disp-empty-placeholder() <$tiddler tiddler=""> <$droppable actions=<> tag="div" enable=<>>
 
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/explor.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/explore-internalTids
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/explor.text:
\define todolist-explore-data-tiddlers() \import [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Todolist/Macro]!has[draft.of]] >Number of internal tiddlers found: <$count filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix]" />
><$macrocall $name="todolist-delete-all-tids" filter=<> />

Todo lists

<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]removeprefixremoveprefix[/state/]sort[]]" variable="baseName"> <$set name=bsFilter value="[prefixsuffixsort[]]">

<> <>

<$list filter=<> variable="internalTid" emptyMessage="//No internal data tiddlers is found!//">
<$macrocall $name="todolist-delete-single-iternalTid" />
<$link to=<>><$view tiddler=<> field="title"/>
\end \define todolist-delete-single-iternalTid() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/times.svg}} <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> \end \define todolist-delete-all-tids-baseName() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" tooltip="Delete all data tiddlers in this Todo list?"> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} <$action-confirm $message="Delete all data tiddlers in this Todo list: $(baseName)$?"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter=<> /> \end \define todolist-delete-all-tids() <$macrocall $name="todolist-confirm-delete" btnLabel="Delete all interal tiddlers?" stateTiddler="temp" countFilter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix]" actionMacro=<> /> \end \define action-empty-archive() <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix]" /> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/inters.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/interstitial-ui
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/inters.text:
\define interstitial-ui(caption:"Interstitial Journals", width:"100%" base:"base") \import [[$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/toggle-edit-button]] \import [[$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/task/show]] \import [[$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/interstitial-utility]] <$vars stateTiddler= """$(td-basePath)$/state/$base$""" taskTiddler= """$(td-basePath)$/tasks/$base$""" >
$caption$
<>
<>
<>
<$list filter="[getindex[editview]match[edit]]" variable=ignore emptyMessage="""<>"""> <>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/inters.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/interstitial-utility
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/inters.text:
\define todolist-input-journal() <$keyboard key="escape" actions=<> > <$keyboard key="enter" actions=<> > <$edit-text tiddler=<> index="itemtext" tag="input" class="kk-todolist-input-textbox" placeholder="add new item" default="" minHeight="1em" focus="yes" /> \end \define todolist-add-journal() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Add new item"> {{$:/core/images/new-button}} <> \end \define todolist-add-journal-action() <$list filter="[getindex[itemtext]!is[blank]]" variable=ignor> <$set name=item value=<> > <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value={{{ [getindex[itemtext]] }}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="itemtext" $value=""/> \end \define todolist-cancel-journal-action() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="itemtext" $value=""/> \end \define todolist-delete-journal(dataTiddler) <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/times.svg}} <$action-setfield $tiddler=<<__dataTiddler__>> $index=<> /> \end \define disp-journals-in-view-mode() \whitespace trim <$list filter="[indexes[]]" variable="item">
<$view tiddler=<> field=title format=date template="0hh:0mm"/>
<>
\end \define disp-journals-in-edit-mode() <$list filter="[indexes[]]" variable="item">
<$view tiddler=<> field=title format=date template="0hh:0mm"/>
<>
<$macrocall $name="todolist-delete-journal" dataTiddler=<>/>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/option.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/options
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/option.text:
\define todolist-options-button()
<$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<<stateTiddler>> stateIndex="option" text="yes">
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Show options" setTitle=<<stateTiddler>> setIndex="option" setTo="yes">
{{$:/core/images/options-button}}
</$button>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<<stateTiddler>> stateIndex="option" text="yes">
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Hide options" setTitle=<<stateTiddler>> setIndex="option" setTo="no">
{{$:/core/images/options-button}}
</$button>
</$reveal>
\end

\define todolist-options-content()
<$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<<stateTiddler>> stateIndex="option" text="yes">
<<todolist-mark-all-button>> <<todolist-archive-completed-items>> <<todolist-display-archived-items>> <<todolist-toggle-timestamp>> <<todolist-all-tasks-unfinished>>
</$reveal>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/priori.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/priority
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/priori.text:
\define categoryColors()
<$list filter="[[$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/settings/colors]indexes[]sortby{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/settings/colors!!list}]" variable=color>
<<color>>
</$list>
\end

\define todolist-set-priority()
<$wikify name=colors text=<<categoryColors>> >
<$macrocall $name="todolist-cycle-color" arraySet=<<colors>> stateTiddler=<<priorityTiddler>> stateIndex=<<item>> />
</$wikify>
\end

\define disp-priority-badge(color)
<svg width="12" height="12" >
<circle cx="6" cy="6" r="5"  stroke="grey" fill="$color$" />
</svg>
\end


\define todolist-cycle-color(arraySet:"", stateTiddler:"", stateIndex:"txt")
<$vars array=<<__arraySet__>>  currentColor={{{[<__stateTiddler__>getindex<__stateIndex__>]}}} >
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Set priority level">
    <$macrocall $name="disp-priority-badge" color=<<currentColor>> />
    <$set
      filter='[enlist<array>after<currentColor>]'
      name=NextItem
      emptyValue={{{[enlist<array>first[]]}}}
    >
    <$action-setfield
     $tiddler=<<__stateTiddler__>>
     $index=<<__stateIndex__>>
     $value=<<NextItem>> />
      </$set>
  </$button>
</$vars>	
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/task/a.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/task/add
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/task/a.text:
\define todolist-input-task()
<$keyboard key="escape" actions=<<todolist-cancel-action>>   >
<$keyboard key="enter"  actions=<<todolist-add-task-action>> >
<$edit-text 
 tiddler=<<stateTiddler>> 
 index="itemtext" 
 tag="input"
 class="kk-todolist-input-textbox"
 placeholder="add new item"
 default="" minHeight="1em" focus="yes"
 />
</$keyboard> 
</$keyboard> 
\end
 
\define todolist-add-task()
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Add new item">
	{{$:/core/images/new-button}}
	<<todolist-add-task-action>>
</$button>
\end

\define todolist-add-task-action()
  <$list filter="[<stateTiddler>getindex[itemtext]!is[blank]]" variable=ignor>
	<$set name=item value=<<now "[UTC]YYYY0MM0DD0hh0mm0ssXXX">> >
	<$action-setfield 
	 $tiddler=<<taskTiddler>>
	 $index=<<item>>
	 $value={{{ [<stateTiddler>getindex[itemtext]] }}}
	/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<statusTiddler>> $index=<<item>> $value="undone"	/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<priorityTiddler>> $index=<<item>> $value="none"	/>
  <$macrocall $name="todolist-add-item-to-list" targetTiddler=<<taskTiddler>> item=<<item>> />
	</$set>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<stateTiddler>> $index="itemtext" $value=""/>
	<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<stateTiddler>> $index="markall"  $value=""	/><!--reset markall button-->
	</$list>
\end

\define todolist-cancel-action()
 <$action-setfield $tiddler=<<stateTiddler>> $index="itemtext" $value=""/>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/task/d.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/task/delete
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/task/d.text:
\define todolist-delete-task(dataTiddler)
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible">
{{$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/images/times.svg}}
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<__dataTiddler__>> $index=<<item>> />
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<statusTiddler>> $index=<<item>> />
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<priorityTiddler>> $index=<<item>> />
<!-- delete item from list field of task tiddler if it is an undone task! -->
<$reveal type="match" text=<<__dataTiddler__>> default=<<taskTiddler>> >
<$macrocall $name="todolist-remove-item-from-list" targetTiddler=<<taskTiddler>> item=<<item>> />
</$reveal>
</$button>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/task/d.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/task/done
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/task/d.text:
\define todolist-done-task()
<$checkbox 
 tiddler=<<statusTiddler>> 
 index=<<item>> 
 checked="done" 
 unchecked="undone" 
 default="undone"
 actions=<<tdl-done-actions>>
>
</$checkbox>
\end

\define tdl-done-actions()
 <$action-setfield 
  $tiddler=<<doneTiddler>>
  $index=<<item>>
  $value={{{ [<taskTiddler>getindex<item>] }}}
  />
<$macrocall $name="todolist-remove-item-from-list" targetTiddler=<<taskTiddler>> item=<<item>> />
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<taskTiddler>> $index=<<item>> />
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/task/s.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/task/show
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/task/s.text: \define todolist-show-task() <$keyboard key="enter" actions=<> > <$list filter="[getindex[editview]match[edit]]" emptyMessage="""<$macrocall $name="view-task" dataTiddler=<> />""" > <$edit-text tiddler=<> index=<> tag=input class="kk-todolist-input-textbox" /> \end \define tdl-kbd-action() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="editview" $value="view" /> \end \define view-task(dataTiddler) <$transclude tiddler=<<__dataTiddler__>> index=<>/> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateIndex="timestamp" text="show"> <$view tiddler=<> field="title" format="date" template="mmm 0DD, YYYY 0hh:0mm"/> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/task/u.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/task/undone
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/task/u.text:
\define todolist-undone-task()
<$checkbox 
tiddler=<<statusTiddler>> 
index=<<item>> 
checked="done" 
unchecked="undone" 
default="undone"
uncheckactions=<<tdl-undone-actions>>
>
</$checkbox>
\end

\define tdl-undone-actions()
<$action-setfield 
$tiddler=<<taskTiddler>>
$index=<<item>>
$value={{{ [<doneTiddler>getindex<item>] }}}
/><
<$macrocall $name="todolist-add-item-to-list" targetTiddler=<<taskTiddler>> item=<<item>> />
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<doneTiddler>> $index=<<item>> />
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/todoli.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/todolist-ui
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/todoli.text:
\define td-basePath() $:/todolist/data \define todolist-ui(caption:"A plain todolist", width:"100%" base:"base") \import [all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Todolist/Macro]!has[draft.of]] \whitespace trim <$vars nameSpace= """$base$""" stateTiddler= """$(td-basePath)$/state/$base$""" taskTiddler= """$(td-basePath)$/tasks/$base$""" doneTiddler= """$(td-basePath)$/done/$base$""" statusTiddler= """$(td-basePath)$/status/$base$""" priorityTiddler="""$(td-basePath)$/priority/$base$""" archiveTiddler= """$(td-basePath)$/archive/$base$""" displayArchivedTiddler="""Todolist - Archived Items - $base$""" >
$caption$
<>
<>
<>
<>
<> <$list filter="[getindex[editview]match[edit]]" variable=ignore emptyMessage="""<$macrocall $name="draggable-list" targetTiddler=<> />"""> <>
<$list filter="[indexes[]!nsort[]]" variable="item"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/template/done-task" field="text" />
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/toggle.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/toggle-edit-button
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/toggle.text:
\define todolist-toggle-edit-button()
<$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<<stateTiddler>> stateIndex="editview" text="edit">
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" setTitle=<<stateTiddler>> setIndex="editview" setTo="edit" tooltip="Edit items">
{{$:/core/images/edit-button}}
</$button>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<<stateTiddler>> stateIndex="editview"  text="edit">
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" setTitle=<<stateTiddler>> setIndex="editview" setTo="view" tooltip="Save items">
{{$:/core/images/done-button}}
</$button>
</$reveal>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/toggle.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/toggle-timestamp
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/toggle.text:
\define todolist-toggle-timestamp()
<$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<<stateTiddler>> stateIndex="timestamp" text="show">
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" setTitle=<<stateTiddler>> setIndex="timestamp" setTo="show" tooltip="Show timestamp">
{{$:/core/images/timestamp-on}}
</$button>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<<stateTiddler>> stateIndex="timestamp"  text="show">
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" setTitle=<<stateTiddler>> setIndex="timestamp" setTo="hide" tooltip="Hide timestamp">
{{$:/core/images/timestamp-off}}
</$button>
</$reveal>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/readme.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/readme
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/readme.text:
; Todolist
Todolist is a small pure wikitext plugin, for creating todo lists and interstitial journaling. Todolist gives you the confidence that everything’s organized and accounted for, so you can make progress on the things that are important to you.

You can also make to-dos for major tasks like a project, a work assignment or an overall goal. Therefore, the overall purpose of creating a to-do is to remember tasks and prioritize them.

//Interstitial journaling// is a productivity technique created by Tony Stubblebine. It’s the simplest way to combine note-taking, tasks, and time tracking in one unique workflow (See [[NessLabs|https://nesslabs.com/interstitial-journaling]]).

;Code and demo
For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Todolist/
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Todolist

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/relink-titles.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/relink-titles-rule.js
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/relink-titles.caption: Todolist data tiddlers
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/relink-titles.description: This rule manages renaming data tiddlers for kookma Todolist plugin

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/settings/colo.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/settings/colors
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/settings/colo.text:
limegreen:50
yellow: 70
orange: 80
red: 100
pink: 90
turquoise:40
dodgerblue:30
none:10
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/settings/colo.list: limegreen yellow orange red pink turquoise dodgerblue none

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/settings/inte.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/settings/internals
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/settings/inte.caption: Todolist Internals
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/settings/inte.text:
\import $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/explore-internalTids

!! Explore Todolist internal tiddlers
<<<
Todolist plugin uses some internal data tiddlers to create and manage todo list. Each todolist uses several data tiddlers. It is recommended after deleting a todolist, delete all data tiddlers which are not in use.
<<<

<<todolist-explore-data-tiddlers>>

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/styles/drag-d.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/styles/drag-drop

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/styles/dynami.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/styles/dynamic.css

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/styles/main.c.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/styles/main.css

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/styles/other..title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/styles/other.css

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/template/arch.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/template/archive-list
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/template/arch.text:
\import $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/archive-operations
\import $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/macros/priority

!! Archive of completed (done) items

<$macrocall $name="todolist-empty-archived-tiddler" base={{!!td-namespace}} />

> <$macrocall $name="todolist-list-archived-items"  base={{!!td-namespace}} />

$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/template/done.title: $:/plugins/kookma/todolist/template/done-task
$:/plugins/kookma/todolist/template/done.text:
<>
<$macrocall $name="view-task" dataTiddler=<> />
<>
<$macrocall $name="todolist-delete-task" dataTiddler=<>/>
